headline: 3 Reasons to Avoid FSLR and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Over the past six months, First Solar has been a great trade, beating the S&P 500 by 8.2%. Its stock price has climbed to $184.79, representing a healthy 13.4% increase. This was partly due to its solid quarterly results, and the performance may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.
